text: At an increasing rate.
Organizations are adopting Apache Flink,

a powerful open source framework
for real time processing to analyze

and extract valuable insights 
from data in real time.

Join thousands of customers
who already use Amazon
managed service for Apache Flink.
A fully managed solution

to easily build and run
Apache Flink applications.

It takes care of everything required
to run stream processing applications.

There are no servers and clusters
to manage, no compute and storage

infrastructure to set up, and you only pay
for the resources you use.

Amazon managed service for Apache Flink
allows you to efficiently set up

and integrate data sources or destinations
with minimal code

process data continuously at high
throughput with

subsequent latencies
and respond to events in real time.
Deep integration with other AWS services
enables you to query and process data
from various sources
and send it to virtually any destination.

Use Amazon managed service for 
Apache Flink Studio
to analyze streaming data interactively

with notebooks and
built in visualizations
within a few clicks.
Focus on building applications

and let Amazon manage 
service for Apache Flink.
Take care of the critical tasks
for running your real time processing
applications today.
